column5: Cola & Critter walk to the bar
column9: Cola and her legs layered. Critter and his limbs - layered. glowing light of the bar windows - layered. use a slow zoom in, or/and pan down of the cam.
Cola and her legs are layered. light can flicker, barkeep's hand with a bottle can go up and down pouring drink, foreground objects layered as well as the drink in the glass.
look up for v2. bartenders hand is layered. you can animate the texture of the light too if cam movement will be used.
look up for v3.
start full frame and slow zoom on critter. Critters ear can be animated up and down lil bit, his tail and head too.
Cola's arms and hands layered, bartender, his bottle, Critter's head and his tongue.
layered: barkeep and his hand, foreground characters and Colas head, light above for animation. u can use layers for a short camera movement from left to right or othervise.

column5: New Panel: Scram's arm rearing back with axe
column9: axe is rearing back. blood trailing behind.
use the "light" layer on the plane to animate gun fire, as well as all the layers marked in green - make those enlarge and diminish in fast mode
use all the space as needed, but focus on 16:9 format.

Scram's axe, jetpack wire, both legs and boots layered. patachute parts can wiggle. blood drops layered. cloud/sky textures layered for motion. dawn has it's fire glow on engines separated. use the splat behind Cola's jet as a wanishing layer of trail.

clouds move in the bg
expand layer of Cola in case you'll decide to make her nod or something. hair are separated for animation as well.

Olivia's limbs are layered (head, hands n legs) for a walk cycle animation. let us know if you need some fixing. Critter's tail, tongue and spit - layered. some grey ground dust textures and sky.. animate the sky to move in the opposit direction to Olivias walk, of course. page 24/25 everything is layered and ready for motion. including the fighter on the left, it's hanging body ona wire and it's engine's fire - layered.

page 24/25 a body attached to a plane is separated. green ambient light on Judge's face layered for possible glowing effect. all objects in the glasses are layered separately, underneath. multiple cloud / sky textures are layered to be animated / moved towards flying ship to creade depth. if Judge's bridge of the muzzle could be puppet-wrapped n animated as he talks, that would be amazing (just a thought for you guys).
look up for v2. Lodge's writing hand and notepad can be animated. use all layers for a slow zoom-in or zoom-out effect.

hand and it's shadow are layered separately.
Judge moves his glass as he talks (a small gesture). could be enlarged for better movement in panel. sky moves slowly in bg

judges hand with a glass could start shaking before trans to next panel (where he eventually crushes the glass)
fingers can be animated. expand the layer with particles in animation. speedlines are layered.
look up for v2. current position of the pilot is placed as final. rotate the figure for punch action - axis on Judges shoulder. some limbs and bg textures are layered for movement too.
drink drops/pools can be expanded slowly in animation. Judge's hands layered. Filen pilot's head could shake a little (as in pain) or just roll in slowly.
background, pilot's torso and head layered. Doctor's head - layered. Judge has some blood drops walling off his glow. whiskey slump could enlarge slowly.
figures are layered as well as textures of lighting. Doctor has her hair bangs layered.
